ListView.Criteria: ([SampleStatus] = ##Enum#Modules.BusinessObjects.Biz.SampleStatus,InStorage# Or [SampleStatus] = ##Enum#Modules.BusinessObjects.Biz.SampleStatus,Confirmation# Or [SampleStatus] = ##Enum#Modules.BusinessObjects.Biz.SampleStatus,Release#) And [Status] <> ##Enum#Modules.BusinessObjects.Biz.BizStatus,Allocation# And [Company] = CurrentCompanyOid() And [CreatedBy] = '@CurrentUserID'
ListView.Caption: Instrument Management

ListView.Criteria: [Company] = CurrentCompanyOid() And ([MainInspector.UserName] = CurrentUserName() Or [CreatedBy.UserName] = CurrentUserName() Or IsAdmin() = '1' Or IsAdministrative() = '1')
ListView.Caption: Order Summary
